description: The smallest city I visited in terms of population, Ishinomaki is a coastal city unfortunately known for taking the brunt of the 2011 Tsunami, resulting in a large loss of life and city damage. 8 years later, the city has recovered quite a bit and my short time there ended up making Ishinomaki my favourite city in all of Japan.
locations: Ishinomori Manga Museum, Tashirojima, Hiyoriyama Park, Ishinomaki Genki market
